name: Witchcrafter Confusion Confession
effectText: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material, including a "Witchcrafter" monster. During your End Phase, if you control a "Witchcrafter" monster while this card is in your GY: You can add this card to your hand. You can only use 1 "Witchcrafter Confusion Confession" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
